_gram:
[{#amara-vat, ra#} being changed
to {#rA#} by <ls>P. VI. 3. 119</ls>]
_meanings:
{@--1@} Abode of
the gods, residence of Indra (said to
be above Meru or the sun's orb; <ab>cf.</ab>
<ls>Ki. 7. 2</ls>); {#sasaMBrameMdradrutapAtitArgalA#} 
{#nimIlitAkzIva BiyA'marAvatI#} <ls>K. P. 1.</ls>

{@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a
modern town in Berar, Amraoti.
